subject: Technology
topic: Database, Email, URL, Web Browser ki Samanya Jankari
D_hi: एक विभागीय डेटा ड्रायरी संकेत संख्याओं
explanation_en:
A database is a structured data storage system that organizes and stores information in a systematic manner.
In simpler terms, it is a way to keep records or data in an orderly way for easy retrieval and management.
